historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-1117.

1973 Ed., § 1-814.

Transfer of Functions

The functions of the Department of Transportation were transferred to the Department of Public Works by Reorganization Plan No. 4 of 1983, effective March 1, 1984.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-225.01.

DC CODE § 2-225.12

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Authorization to test materials in laboratory of Department of Transportation. [Repealed]
